item.description:
Presented by Festival Fete at Waterplace Park Festival Fete presents The Waterplace Park Art Festival, taking place for the first time in Providence, Rhode Island on August 7th, 2011. The Waterplace Park Art Festival will feature over 100 Contemporary American Art and Craft artists along with a variety of strolling entertainment, interactive community art, music and FREE children’s crafts. Please join us for a truly innovative day filled with many moments of merriment and festivities!

Times: 9am-5pm

Tickets: FREE

Phone: 401-374-3899

Official website: http://www.festivalfe...

Waterplace Park In between Memorial Blvd & Francis Street Providence, RI 02903
item.name: Waterplace Park Art Festival .
